Bacloud.com - OWN data center operator in Lithuania, Europe

We have special deal for first month, use coupon code **FirstMonth** to get discount on all **E3v6, E5 and Dual E5 servers!**

One processor - Bacloud-E3v6G 
 » CPU: Intel® Celeron® Processor G3900T 2C/2T (2M Cache, 2.60 GHz)
 » RAM: 16GB DDR4 ECC 
 » 1 HDD: 3.5" 1TB 6GB/S SATA3
 » 2 HDD: 3.5" 1TB 6GB/S SATA3

 » OS: Linux OS
 » Linux OS: Centos 6 64-bit
 » Control panel for Linux: No Control Panel

Available upgrades to 1230v6 or 1240v4 CPU's, RAM, HDD's/SSD's.
